txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Needed: Sharp claws from the massive toads plaguing Meluinen. Deliver the items to Thaliollang at Lin Giliath.
'The toads are not normal and needed to be purged. Thank you for your efforts.'
'We must learn what has caused these toads to grow so large and what has given such sharp claws.'
Elves of Rivendell Task: Sharp Claws
Thaliollang in the Elf-ruin of Meluinen at Lin Giliath requires the return of sharp claws.
Deliver the sharp claws to Thaliollang at Lin Giliath
You are on a task to collect sharp claws from the massive toads plaguing Meluinen and to deliver them to Thaliollang. Thaliollang can be found at Lin Giliath, the Elf-ruins of Meluinen.
Needed: Sharp claws from the massive toads plaguing Meluinen.
